Plintissa groaned from pain....she was impaled again...ah!
memories........she didn't belive that this was her former base.......her
job with the Predacons had been screwed because Gangon told Hell Beast about
her taking shots for Iron Raptor.....she couldn't join the Alliance, because
Dracona knew she was up to no good.....now she didn't have a home....all
because of that dimwit Liono!......oh, well....she got him in the end....she
thoguht, thinking about all of the weapons she had taken...and now, she
didn't destroy the Autobots for fear of destroying Iron raptor...she had
become a softy!......she watched Suukie battle with Sinesis......Sinesis was
struggling to destroy the Autobots, but Suukie was preventing him
from......Sinesis was actually taking this time to charge his beam...he had
been charging this beam since arival to earth, this beam had such power,
that it didn't level anything except what it hit....and Sinesis was now
trying to aim it at Optimus Prime!.....Suukie pulled him around and kept him
from shooting, just because he knew how much he could help......
----- Original Message -----
From: "Iron Raptor" <ironraptor13@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 16, 2000 2:23 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> ( Yes, I know I'm late.)
>
> * Iron Raptor sighed and lifted her her hands into the air, she caught
Prowl's talons easily.
> It was a shame that her friend had chosen a path as such but it was
Plintissa's life, not her own.
> But now she was an enemy, and it was her own job to try and eliminate the
enemies of the Maximals.
> She was touched that Plintissa had taken that shot from Gangon for her but
she couldn't say the same if Plintissa had been attacked.
> Iron Raptor tightened her grip on Prowl's talons, at least she had other
friends left, she looked up at him but then back down.
> But business was at hand and there was no time to dwell on things, with
the commander on some date with his girlfriend and his second-in-command at
the scene already.
> Iron Raptor opened her communicator to Tigerhawk.*
>
> " Could you please give me a report on the situation, Tigerhawk? It would
really be helpful so Prowl and myself would know what to expect when we get
there."
>
>
